title: Almost Century Gothic, But Not....
content:
looking for an exact match.... thanks!

author: Fontophile

comments.content:
The quality of the sample is a bit coarse, but I think it is [ITC Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20091114124852/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-avant-garde-gothic/).

greetings Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20091114124852/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)
